postData.contentHtml:
• When defining your private and public subnets, they should be a subset of the CIDR range defined for the VPC.
  • Should enable DNS on the VPC by default, somethings require it.
  • Don't use default VPC.

Resources:

  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yduHaOj3XMg
postData.title: AWS From Scratch with Terraform - Setting up your VPC and CIDR Ranges
